overview: Joshua and Rudy often meet in the fitness center like to enjoy each other’s company. But where are Kiko and Mario today? Instead of exercising in the fitness center, they are at home getting it on. Every week, Nick and Nikolas go to the aqua park to enjoy swimming and looking at the hard cocks of other guys in the showers. Immediately after swimming, Nick is trying to pick up another boy. Damian has completely different interests. His main hobbies are chatting on the internet, masturbating in front of a webcam and meeting new guys. This time, too, he is meeting a new guy and will enjoy hot sex with him! Photo casting has changed into hot sex! Kenny Jacobs has invited Kevin Kraus to his home studio, but no photographing occurred. The boys immediately started to get it on. Lucky has a meeting today with Robin Few. He is waiting for him at the bus stop, and Kevin and Rudy arrive. These two boys always catch Lucky when he has a meeting agreed on with someone.
title: Boys and the City 2
